ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.content:
Cacao Paste*, Cacao Powder*, Lion’s Mane*, Reishi*, Ashwagandha*, Ceylon Cinnamon*, Desert Salt*
*ORGANIC

brew-guide.title: Brew Guide
brew-guide.content:
Add 1½ - 2 Tbsp (15g) to 200-250ml of warm milk of choice or water. Do not boil. 
 Allow time to melt and merge. 
 To froth, mix in a blender, plunge up and down vigorously in a French press, or shake in a jar. 
 Add sweetener if desired.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Shipping takes 2-5 business days. All packages are carefully packed to ensure your brews arrive in perfect condition. For returns, please contact us on info@veera.co.za.

additional-info.title: Additional Info
additional-info.content:
Mood Magick bags are 100% recyclable where possible. Refer to the bottom of the bag to see whether or not your bag is recyclable.

This product is produced in a facility that handles dairy, soy and tree nuts.
